replies.body: Did Pulsefire Caitlyn already go on a discount rate earlier this year?
Not yet. I'm surprised at Soul Hunter Kayn coming before Pulsefire Cait. I'm like a 100% sure PF Cait came out before Kayn's launch.
Thanks. Yeah you're right, on top of that, Dawnbringer Riven and Nightbringer Yasuo came out after Pulsefire Caitlyn.

Yeah this is very strange. The latest she should have been in the early sales WAS the November Early Sales. The fact that she's not in the December Sales is either Riot saying she's not going on sale or that they forgot her skin existed. A bit concerning to the people who were waiting for her to go on sale.

What are you guys smoking?  PF Caitlyn is part of November's early sale and is literally on sale RIGHT NOW...  Do you even bother to look at the store before posting?

https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/november-early-sales-111717-112017

1. You need to calm down
2. SHE WAS NOT THERE. Why do you think she's at the bottom of the list? YES we read before posting. Riot realized their mistake and ADDED HER.

I swear some people just jump the gun before finding out the whole situation.

And no, we shouldn't HAVE to look at the store because the sales page should reflect what's in the store. And I already had her so it's not going to show her on sale for me regardless.
are you guys high shes getting discounted for November early sales Lmfao
She wasn't there. That's why she's at the bottom of the list. She was added AFTER the page went up.
ahh ok
Where is our pulsefire cait >>>_>>>{{champion:51}}
She's on sale now if you didn't know
You guys know Pulsefire Caitlyn already came out right? By the looks of it, nope... i think it was in november-- im not sure but it was recent.

At the time I made that post, Pulsefire Caitlyn was not listed in the November sales list, then Riot revealed her to be on sale around November 22-25 when the early sales come around without any prior notification. I remember Riot did refund people who bought her right before her sale was shown since they did not give out any warning beforehand.
Shes getting discounted for November early sales
She's on sale in the shop right now!
Thank you and thank goodness, guess they forgot to add her to the list for this month.
Bro... Pulsefire cait is on sale atm
hell yeah just bought nightbringer yasuo for 2 accounts right before sale announcement, no refund feelsgoodman
why would u do that tho
because I wanted it and there was no sale announcement at the time

For everyone posting about Pulsefire Caitlyn...

Check the damn post for the November sale that started today, because she's on sale RIGHT NOW if you bothered to look.  Obviously when the November sales list went up they accidentally omitted here because she's on the official announcement here: 

https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/november-early-sales-111717-112017
